item.description:
We will be taking a walk/hike at Gay City state park. It is located off Route 85 in Hebron. Let's meet in the parking lot, and plan which trails to walk. Bring water, and wear comfy shoes. I'm hoping that with a central location, we get a good turnout! (This is the rescheduled event from the rained out June 25th.)

The leader for this event is Wendi (http://socialnetwork....) from Southeastern. All questions on this event should be directed to her.

This event is a crosslisting with the Southeastern CT Social Club meetup (http://socialnetwork....)

A map can be found at:
http://www.dep.state....

For more information, see http://www.dep.state....

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Wendi's Walk/Hike in Gay City State Park, Hebron CT
